results.description: Lionel Messi scores a hat-trick, including two sublime free-kicks, as champions Barcelona return to winning ways against Celta Vigo in La Liga.
results.shortTitle: Messi hat-trick sends Barca top again
results.title: Barcelona 4-1 Celta Vigo: Lionel Messi hits hat-trick as champions reclaim top spot

results.description: Zinedine Zidane says Gareth Bale 'will stay' at Real Madrid after he helped them to a 3-1 win over Celta Vigo in their La Liga opener.
results.shortTitle: Bale 'will stay' at Real, says Zidane
results.title: Celta Vigo 1-3 Real Madrid: Zidane insists Bale will stay

results.description: Midfielder Mathias Jensen joins Championship side Brentford on a four-year deal from Spanish La Liga club Celta Vigo.
results.shortTitle: Jensen joins Brentford from Celta Vigo
results.title: Mathias Jensen: Celta Vigo midfielder joins Championship side Brentford

results.description: Barcelona rested several key players for their La Liga match against Celta Vigo with an eye on their Champions League tie against Liverpool.
results.shortTitle: Barca fall to shock defeat by Celta Vigo
results.title: Celta Vigo 2-0 Barcelona: Spanish champions rest Messi, Suarez & Pique in shock defeat

results.description: Barcelona travel to Celta Vigo in La Liga - follow live text commentary.
results.shortTitle: Much-changed Barcelona lose at Celta Vigo
results.title: Celta Vigo v Barcelona live in La Liga

results.description: Gareth Bale and Isco score against Celta Vigo to give Zinedine Zidane a winning start on his return to Real Madrid.
results.title: Real Madrid 2-0 Celta Vigo

results.description: Live text commentary of Real Madrid v Celta Vigo in La Liga with Zinedine Zidane back in charge of Los Blancos.
results.shortTitle: Bale scores as Real Madrid win on Zidane's return
results.title: Real Madrid v Celta Vigo in La Liga

results.description: West Ham are considering whether to trigger the £43.3m release clause in the contract of Celta Vigo striker Maxi Gomez.
results.shortTitle: West Ham may trigger Gomez release fee
results.title: Maxi Gomez: West Ham may pay Celta Vigo striker's release fee

results.description: Barcelona restore their three-point lead at the top of La Liga thanks to goals from Ousmane Dembele and Lionel Messi.
results.shortTitle: Dembele & Messi score in Barcelona win
results.title: Barcelona 2-0 Celta Vigo: Ousmane Dembele and Lionel Messi score in victory

results.description: Real Madrid travel to Celta Vigo, AC Milan host Juventus plus updates from the Ligue 1 game between Monaco and PSG.
results.title: Celta Vigo v Real Madrid, AC Milan v Juventus, Monaco v PSG

results.description: Celta Vigo striker Iago Aspas scores a hat-trick against Eibar - after spending the night in hospital following the birth of his daughter.
results.shortTitle: Hat-trick for Aspas - after night on maternity ward
results.title: Celta Vigo 4-0 Eibar: Iago Aspas scores hat-trick after night in hospital

results.description: Alaves go top of La Liga after beating Celta Vigo, although five teams are in contention to overtake them this weekend.
results.shortTitle: Alaves top of La Liga after win at Celta
results.title: Celta Vigo 0-1 Alaves: Basque side go top of La Liga with win

results.description: Atletico Madrid's 2-0 defeat at Celta Vigo was "the best thing that could happen for us" according to manager Diego Simeone.
results.title: Celta Vigo 2-0 Atletico Madrid: Stefan Savic sent off in Atletico defeat

results.description: Wolves have completed the loan signing of defender Jonny Castro Otto from Atletico Madrid.
results.shortTitle: Wolves sign Atletico defender Otto on loan
results.title: Jonny Castro Otto: Wolves sign Atletico defender on loan

results.description: Gareth Bale scores twice to boost his chances of starting in the Champions League final as Real Madrid thrash Celta Vigo.
results.title: Real Madrid 6-0 Celta Vigo

results.description: Real Madrid face Celta Vigo at the Santiago Bernabeu in their final home game of the season - follow live text commentary.
results.shortTitle: Real Madrid v Celta Vigo - Bale scores twice
results.title: European football: Real Madrid v Celta Vigo

results.description: A much-changed Barcelona are held at Celta Vigo as Ernesto Valverde rests players before Saturday's Copa del Rey final against Sevilla.
results.title: Celta Vigo 2-2 Barcelona

results.description: Follow live coverage of Barcelona's visit to Celta Vigo in La Liga, plus updates from Bayer Leverkusen v Bayern Munich in the German Cup semi-final.
results.shortTitle: Celta Vigo level against Barca, plus eight goals in Leverkusen v Bayern
results.title: Live: Celta Vigo v Barcelona, plus Bayer Leverkusen v Bayern Munich

results.description: Lionel Messi scores twice in the opening 15 minutes as Barcelona thrash Celta Vigo to reach the Copa del Rey quarter-finals.
results.title: Barcelona 5-0 Celta Vigo (6-1 agg)

results.description: Zinedine Zidane ya bayyana 'yan wasa Real Madrid 18 da za su fuskanci Celta Vigo a gasar La Liga da za su kara a wasan mako na 18 a ranar Lahadi.
results.title: 'Yan wasan Real 18 da za su fafata da Celta
